Leagues

Bob's League

When: Every Tuesday - 4PM

Where: Fieldstone Golf Club

The fee is $25 per week for 18 holes with a cart. A minimum of 6 players is required for League play. League play rotates nines weekly. League players can play 9 holes before or after for only $15.00. League players can get a discount on six pack prices in the Pro Shop.

OU Student's League

When: Every Monday - 3PM (OU STUDENTS ONLY)

Where: OU R&S Sharf Golf Course

The fee is $10 per week for 9 holes with a cart. A minimum of 6 players is required for League play. League play rotates nines weekly. League players can play 9 holes before or after for only $5.00. League players can get a discount on six pack prices in the Pro Shop.

Jim's League

When: Every Thursday - 5PM

Where: Black Heath Golf Club

The fee is $21 per week for 9 holes with a cart. League play requires a minimum of 8 players. League play rotates nines weekly. League players can play 9 holes before or after for only $12.00. League players can get a discount on six pack prices in the Pro Shop.

Are you looking for Leagues to play?

Click the button to learn more about Leagues going on in OC.
